title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Lincoln Riley to USC Reaction, Mike Silver on Rodgers, Brady, Niners, Week 12
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Lincoln Riley to USC Reaction, Mike Silver on Rodgers, Brady, Niners, Week 12
description:
Colin reacts to USC's blockbuster Lincoln Riley hire, why it took him by surprise, and the ripple effects it will have on college football (3:00). He also discusses why he didn't buy into the Matthew Stafford hype (13:00), and the one thing Patriots haters probably don't want to hear (15:00). Then, longtime NFL writer Mike Silver and Colin discuss why Brady's Bucs looked different against the Colts (20:00), why Aaron Rodgers sometimes looks "supernatural" (22:00), the major downside of having great QB arm talent (26:00), if the Niners have re-entered the conversation as a playoff threat (32:00), which teams could be dumping their QBs after the season (39:00), how the Seahawks can fix their mess, and the head coaches that could be looking for work soon (46:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
